item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513): Keypad and RPM Panel
item.description:

The contact pads were unsoldered and removed for a closer look. While they seemed okay, the leaf contacts engaged by the actuators showed signs of oxidation. To address the oxidation, a fiberglass brush and Deoxit were used, restoring the contacts to a shiny and clean condition...
